law.text: Unless otherwise agreed, a tenant shall occupy his dwelling unit only as a dwelling unit. The rental agreement may require that the tenant notify the landlord of any anticipated extended absence from the premises in excess of seven (7) days no later than the first day of the extended absence.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 176, sec. 24, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 378, sec. 25.
